bib.abstract: WordNet is a large electronic lexical database for English (Miller 1995, Fellbaum 1998a). It originated in 1986 at Princeton University where it continues to be developed and maintained. George A. Miller, a psycholinguist, was inspired by experiments in Artificial
bib.booktitle: Theory and applications of ontology: computer applications
